title: Ethereum Validator Activation Queue Grows: 90,000+ Validators Waiting in Line
description: Ethereum faces congestion for validators to enter and begin staking in the protocol. According to data from Wenmerge, an information dashboard, more than 90,000 validators are waiting to provide protocol validation services on Ethereum. This means a validator entering the queue today must wait more than 46 days to be activated and begin its tasks. […]

title: Met museum to refund $550k in donations from FTX
description: In a recent event, FTX Trading Ltd. has filed a court motion seeking approval for a stipulation with The Metropolitan Museum of Art. The museum seeks to give back $500K to the bankrupt exchange.

title: XRP’s Price Will Soon Break the $0.60 Barrier, Predicts Trader
description:
The crypto trader and analyst KALEO predicted in a tweet on Saturday that XRP price will soar to above $0.60 in the next few days.
